channel.title: .Xml and VB6
channel.description:
Ok, heres my problem:
Theres an .xml file on a site, I want to be able to read the xml, then display the variables in a Vb6 program.
Countless searches on google, and ask.com are telling me I need to parse the .xml file to get the data. So heres my question.
[b]How do I parse .xml files in Vb6?[/b]
Edit: I'm not asking to be spoonfeed either, just explain to me how it works. That or point me to a really nice tut...

item.title: .Xml and VB6
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Exception, post:4, topic:169284”][quote author=Niall link=topic=228979.msg1968764#msg1968764 date=1199213561]
And the rest of the community won’t recommend C# at all.
[/quote]
What would they recommend then? Java has got to be the most shit language for doing anything with XML.[/quote]C# is shit in general, lol’d.

Read full topic
